O

org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common - package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common
Provides common classes for JAAS modules such as abstract login modules, common interfaces, and default implementations.
org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.audit - package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.audit
Provides an interface, a configurable factory, and a default implementation for common auditing in the JAAS modules.
org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.messageq - package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.messageq
Provides an interface, a configurable factory, and a default implementation for common utilization of message queues in the JAAS modules.
org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.propsbuilder - package org.beiter.michael.authn.jaas.common.propsbuilder
Provides classes to build the properties required for the JDBC common module.

Resets the internal state of the factory, which causes the MessageQFactory.getSingleton(String, CommonProperties) method to return a new MessageQ instance the next time it is called.
